vlive.korean: 우리는 개인적인 의열 투쟁을 했죠. Meanwhile, Koreans resisted with heroic actions. 듣기 View video 10PM : 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! Movie talk!talk!
vlive.english: Meanwhile, Koreans resisted with heroic actions.

vlive.korean: 효과가 좀 있네요. - 지금 요새 단식투쟁 중입니다. It's had an effect. - I'm on a hunger strike. 듣기 View video B.A.P : 약속
vlive.english: It's had an effect. - I'm on a hunger strike.

vlive.korean: 제 자신에게 단식투쟁... 말이 안 나와요. It's a self-imposed hunger strike... I don't know what I'm saying. 듣기 View video B.A.P : 약속
vlive.english: It's a self-imposed hunger strike... I don't know what I'm saying.

vlive.korean: 지금 현재 투쟁을 하고 있는 장면 사이가 교차 편집이 굉장히 자주 나오잖아요. And the current struggles are cross-edited very often. 듣기 View video V BOOKS : <송곳> 최규석 작가 북토크 생중계 (게스트 : 주호민, 이종범)
vlive.english: And the current struggles are cross-edited very often.

examples.korean: The fight for his release gathers momentum each day. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 석방을 위한 투쟁에 나날이 탄력[가속도]이 붙고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The fight for his release gathers momentum each day. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Demonstrations were held as a gesture of solidarity with the hunger strikers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 단식 투쟁을 벌이는 사람들에 대한 연대의 표시로 시위들이 벌어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
